description: Core metrics for monitoring the Onehouse powered lakehouse

panels.description: The number of messages in Kafka Topic that have not been ingested to Onehouse table yet.
panels.title: [Kafka Source] Number of messages pending to be ingested
Top 10 tables with the most bytes written
Top 10 tables with the most records written
Total Bytes Written in Ingestion Commits
Total partitions written in Ingestion Commits

panels.description: We plot the desired sync time for the table vs the actual sync time we could manage based on current compute/memory resources
panels.title: Sync Duration & Configured Sync Frequency
Top 10 Streams with Longest Sync Durations

panels.description: Plots the number of consecutive syncs where the actual sync duration exceeds the configured sync durations. Note that it is a cumulative sum.
panels.title: Number of consecutive sync lags

panels.description: Actual local time when the last sync was completed.
panels.title: Absolute time of the last sync

panels.description: Number of sync failures over time. A sync is failed if no data was committed due to some errors.
panels.title: Number of sync failures
Top 10 Streams with the longest Compaction Durations
Number of bytes compacted by Compaction Commits
Number of partitions touched by Compaction Commits
Top 10 Streams with the Longest Clustering Durations
Total Bytes Written by Clustering Commits
Total Partitions Written By Clustering Commits

panels.description: Cleaner service runs periodically to delete all the old versions of files.
panels.title: Top 10 Streams with the Longest Cleaner Duration

title: Onehouse Data Metrics 2.0
